p: For tannins identification, 0.1 gram of the aqueous extract was boiled in 20â€‰mL of distilled water in a test tube and then filtered. The filtration method used here is the normal method, which includes a conical flask and filter paper. Three drops of 0.1% FeCl 2 were added to the filtered samples and observed for a brownish green or a blue black color, which indicates the presence of tannins [ 30].
